org.apache.orc.util

Class BloomFilterUtf8

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.orc.util.BloomFilter
      • org.apache.orc.util.BloomFilterUtf8

  • public class BloomFilterUtf8
extends BloomFilter
    This class represents the fix from ORC-101 where we fixed the bloom filter from using the JVM's default character set to always using UTF-8.
